definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: I really admire your courage in biting your toe nail in public.
sentences.chinese: 我真信服你敢於在平易近衆場所咬腳趾甲的勇氣。

sentences.english: Out of the shower now, I finish the last of the beer while trimming my toenails.
sentences.chinese: 洗完澡，我剪着趾甲喝完最後一口啤酒。

sentences.english: I want to have a manicure and a pedicure.
sentences.chinese: 我想做手指甲和腳趾甲。
你應該剪一剪你的腳趾甲了。

sentences.english: I won’t bite my nails if you don’t pick your toes.
sentences.chinese: 你不剔趾甲，我就不咬手指甲。

sentences.english: Trim toenails straight across using nail clippers.
sentences.chinese: 用指甲刀逐個修剪腳趾甲。

sentences.english: Many of the same signs occur in toenails.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的信號也會出現在腳趾甲上。

sentences.english: The Queen blames the Tories for everything, from ingrowing toenails to cholera.
sentences.chinese: 從趾甲倒生到霍亂，女王把大事小事都歸咎於保守黨。

sentences.english: You can also polish your toe nails according to the theme of the occasion and the summer time.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以根據夏天和場合的主題給腳趾甲擦上指甲油。

sentences.english: Usually five hoof-like toenails grow on each foot.
sentences.chinese: 每個腳掌上通常長着五個鉤狀趾甲。

sentences.english: Pads are thick and springy while nails are strong and dark colored.
sentences.chinese: 腳墊厚實而有彈性，趾甲堅硬而且顏色深。

sentences.english: Fungal infections occur in toenails more often than in fingernails.
sentences.chinese: 真菌感染較多的發生在大拇趾的趾甲上。

sentences.english: I especially love it when her toenails are painted too.
sentences.chinese: 當她的腳趾甲被塗上顏色時，我更加喜歡。

sentences.english: Do you believe one day that men will start to wear high heels and enamel nails?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得男人們將來也會穿高跟鞋，塗腳趾甲麼？

sentences.english: This will minimize the chances of recurrence of ingrown toenails.
sentences.chinese: 這會降低腳趾甲再向內生長的概率。

definition: variant of 腳趾|脚趾[jiao3 zhi3]
